hibernate-mapping.query: select flight from com.ff.domain.transport.FlightDO flight, com.ff.domain.transport.TransportDO transport, com.ff.domain.routeserviced.TripDO trip, com.ff.domain.routeserviced.RouteDO route where flight.flightId = transport.flightDO.flightId and transport.transportId = trip.transportDO.transportId and trip.routeDO.routeId = route.routeId and transport.transportModeDO.transportModeId = 1 and route.originCityDO.cityId = :origionCityId and route.destCityDO.cityId = :destCityId
